comments:
Build ID: I20070517-1700

Steps To Reproduce:
Use UML2Tools M7 taken from UpdateSite.
Create ClassD. Change IconStyle (UML Class Diagram -> Icon Style preference page). Then error message about NPE appears, diagram and toolbar are not shown.

NPE:

More information:
There is no needed 'icons' directory in 'org.eclipse.uml2.diagram.common' plugin. 
Reason: 'icons' directory wasn't included in 'bin.includes' list in build.properties file.
Missed resources were included into build starting from RC
